description.value: You can take the form of a terrifying aberration. When you Change Shape, you can choose one of the following: gain the effects of a 4th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{enlarge} spell and 6th-rank @UUID[Compendium.starfinder-field-test-for-pf2e.spells.Item.fiwhzHpbOsugCrON]{eldritch bond} spell; gain the effects of a 2nd-rank enlarge spell and 6th-rank eldritch bond spell granting three abilities; or gain the effects of a 6th-rank eldritch bond spell granting four abilities. This effect lasts for 1 minute or until you shift back, whichever comes first.
